## TODO allow interactive querying of the treatment label

```{r}

library(ggplot2)

aesel <- c("FATIGUE", "VOMITING", "DIARRHOEA", "ANAEMIA")

datplot <- bpae %>%
    gather(aetype, prop, which(names(.) %in% paste0(aesel,"_p")))  %>%
    filter(!is.na(prop)) %>%
    droplevels()

p <- ggplot(data=datplot,
       aes(x=prop, y=`Trial name`,
           size=N, col=`treatment`)) +
    facet_wrap(vars(aetype)) + 
    geom_point(size=2) +
    xlim(0,1)
p

library(plotly)
ggplotly(p)

```
